name: The JetSetter Tote
description:
Made to order - Production time approximately three weeks

Classic, timeless and built to last. Fits just enough to carry daily or for a quick jetset to Paris. Interior pockets fit your iPad and iPhone or Moleskine journal snugly. Handy pen slot for your inherited MontBlanc. Adjustable shoulder straps. Solid brass hardware. Handmade from 3-4oz natural vegetable tanned leather. Hand set copper rivets, waxed and burnished edges.

Dimensions: 12" x 14" x 3"

Noah Marion Quality Goods focuses on untreated, undyed natural vegetable tanned leather in order to allow the user to personally bring the design to life. Each person will interact with their wallet, bag or belt differently and therefore it will truly become yours with use. Please keep this in mind when using your goods, they will change, they will age, they will darken. This is the goal, they get better and better with age. A water spot here, a coffee stain there just adds to the character of the piece.  If you have any questions please contact us. 

100% handmade in Austin, TX from start to finish.
